checks.description: Verify third-party service connections through network monitoring
checks.request: az network watcher connection-monitor list --query '[].{Name:name, ResourceGroup:resourceGroup, MonitoringStatus:monitoringStatus}' --output json

checks.description: Verify external dependency tracking in application insights
checks.request: az monitor app-insights component show --app fedramp-appinsights --resource-group fedramp-prod-rg --query '{Name:name, Kind:kind, ApplicationType:applicationType}' --output json

checks.description: Verify container base image and dependency inventory
checks.request: az acr repository show --name fedrampregistry --repository webapp --query '{Name:name, Registry:registry, LastUpdateTime:lastUpdateTime}' --output json

checks.description: Verify third-party resource identification procedures and documentation
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify third-party resource identification procedures, dependency mapping, and vendor management processes
